Reviews.Title: “Bugs!”

Reviews.Content: nice price strip club staff friendly clean obvious insect time bathroom cockroach scurrying floor thats dealbreaker middle night brother bitten multiple times bugs im praying flees bedbugs dear god please bedbugs dont evidence theyve followed home ill ripping apart sheets doing thorough mattress inspection hotel stay disturbing
